The basic node hierarchy of the platform_config database is:

platform.
    startup.
    memory.
        layout.
        media_base_address = 0xXXXXXXXX
    power.
    software.
        threads.
        drivers.
            avcap.
                csc.
                edid.
                    50_hz_priority_list.
                    60_hz_priority_list.
                    50_hz_addition_list.
                    60_hz_addition_list.
                    3D_Format.
                    audio.
                hdcp.
                i2c.
                infoframe_notification.
                video.
            display.
                stereo.
            smd.
                audio.
                    capture.
                    render.
                bufmon.
                clock.
                    clock_properties.
                core.
                    frame_buffer_properties.
                demux.
                tsout.
                viddec.
                vidpproc.
                vidrend.
            osal.
            pal.
            sven.
